example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS اطلع) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN المرشحين))) (PP-CLR (PREP على) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN اجواء) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN الامتحانات)))))) (CONJ ف) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS تفاوتت) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_NOM اجابات) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MP هم))) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN تفاوت) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN استعدادات) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MP هم)))))))

verb.comment: EGYPTIAN ARABIC Framefile based on tafAwat-v
